title: Bragi Wireless Headphones
description: Listen. Track. Communicate. Get the world’s first true wireless Hearable, a smart device that simply fits in your ears. Enjoy a magnificent sound experience with the greatest comfort, guaranteed by the PerfectFit system. Experience progressive In-ear biometric sensors, live activity feedback and gesture controls - to always keep you going strong.

title: Decorative Bowl Ballerina
description: The deco bowl Ballerina in glossy brass is the ultimate eye catcher. It enriches every room with its high quality - Made in Sweden.

title: HappyBrush
description: I am more than a toothbrush. I am exactly the type of mouth care of your dreams: easy, effective and honest with a certain aspiration to design. Besides that, it should also be fun - and I mean what I say... ehhm write! Neither do I have any unnecessary expensive product features nor dubious ingredients. I strive to combine fair prices and professional oral care. And I want to help as well! In short: I want to make the world a little better - because that makes everyone happy :)

title: i+m Shower Gel and Shampoo
description: Life, culture and passion - a body care inspired by the charme of this unique european metropolis. The city i+m with its social commitment and ecological motivation calls home since 35 years now. The Berlin body lotion soaks in and gives your skin sleekness and revitalizes yours sense with its fresh scent. Sheabutter spends intesive moisture. Precious olive oil acts lipid rebalancing, argan oil regenerates your skin. With this product you support three fair-trade projects: sheabutter from Uganda, argan oil from Morocco and olive oil from Palastine.

title: MyProtein - The Whey
description: Our ultra-premium blend of the purest whey proteins is crafted to produce the finest nutritionals for promoting muscle growth and maintenance. Leading the way with 25g of protein, and boasting less than 2g carbs, 1g fat, 3g leucine, and over 5g glutamine – we’re setting a new standard. Thewhey also delivers MyZyme® – an expertly developed blend of enzymes that break proteins into their amino acids while being digested to form the building blocks of muscle in the body. Specially created for this product, it offers you more protease than any other enzyme blend on the market – giving you the drive to power through strength-loss like never before.

title: Brocks Backpack
description:
DESIGN: The design of Adore June's Brocks collection is timeless and reduced to the essence. Design is Adore June's passion, quality its aspiration. The backpack has two zippered pockets on its front side.
QUALITY: This backpack is handmade. Adore June puts emphasis on qualitative materials and high quality processing. By having its own production facilities in europe, we are able to define our own quality benchmarks.
MATERIAL: The Brocks is made out of Jeans and a waterproof cordura-fabric with teflon coating. The chosen materials make the sleeve robust and lightweigtht.

title: The First Inflatable Surfboard
description:
Worlds first inflatable surfboards - by Tripstix 
Super-stable for a board of this length with radical all-round ability in any type of condition. 
Efficient rocker shape, thruster fin setup, extra stiffness and pure performance. 
Fine rails forward provide sensitivity when setting your rail and in cutbacks. The thicker tail rail produces acceleration and drive in turns. 
The rocker and outline provide the ability to catch waves easily and accelerate rapidly, but also project vertically while maintaining hard cutbacks. 
This short and stable board truly performs on waves, but is also a much loved favorite on rivers and flat-waters.

title: Laptop Sleeve - Made in Kyrgyztan
description:
Even a laptop knows how to combine style and awareness. "Naked" is one of the few which makes a good figure in public even when naked. The fitting sleeve protects your laptop against drops and offers a spacious leather pocket on the backside. 
- High-quality and durable laptop sleeve 
- Noble cowskin and finest merina wool felt 
- Fair and transparent craftmanship from Kyrgyztan

title: Mouth-Blown Vase Julie
description: Mouth-blown vase of purple-colored glass - 11cm of height and 7cm in diameter. The brass covered vase neck produces a lovely color contrast. Thanks to the premium workmanship and harmonic colors Julie is a must-have for every style of interior.

title: Daniel Wellington
description: With a classic black leather strap and an eggshell white dial, Classic Petite Sheffield is the kind of watch that goes with anything your wardrobe has to offer.

title: Chanel
description: Famous Chanel N°5 is a symbol of good taste and is currently one of the best selling perfumes in the world. Coco Chanel asked the perfume designer Ernest Beaux to create a perfume ' which smells like a woman'.
